misc: Loves basketball even more than Marcus, making some fans wonder if he's a real golfer
biography: Pasi, affectionately known as "Susi-Pasi", is a formidable competitor from Vuosaari Golf Helsinki. His dedication to the sport is evident, though some whisper that his true passion lies on the basketball court, perhaps even surpassing the enthusiasm of his peer, Marcus. This has led some fans to jokingly question whether Pasi is truly a golfer at heart.

Having participated in the Hector Trophée on three prior occasions, Pasi is no stranger to the pressures of this prestigious tournament. His fourth appearance is slated for the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025.
Pasi's past performance includes one victory at the Hector Trophée, marking him as a serious contender whenever he decides to show up.
